hero.title: Premium Chemical Distribution
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for industrial chemicals, adhesives, resins, and specialty coatings worldwide

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Specialized adhesive, resin, and pigment solutions for key industries.

packaging.title: Packaging & Food Processing
packaging.description: High-performance hot melt adhesives for cartons, labels, and tapes with fast setting times.

coatings.title: Paints & Coatings
coatings.description: Saturated resins for superior gloss, adhesion, and weather resistance in coatings.

plastics.title: Plastics & Polymers
plastics.description: High-quality pigments with excellent color strength and heat stability for polymers.

manufacturing.title: Industrial Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Specialized chemical solutions for assembly, production lines, and heavy-duty applications.

logistics.title: Global Logistics & Compliance
logistics.subtitle: We don't just deliver chemicals; we manage the complex intersection of global logistics, safety regulations, and supply chain continuity.

temperature.title: Temperature-Controlled
temperature.description: State-of-the-art cold chain management for sensitive reagents.

hubs.title: Strategic Hubs
hubs.description: Distribution centers in 12 major international ports for faster transit.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Expertise
regulatory.description: Full REACH, OSHA, and ISO 9001:2015 documentation management.

hero.title: Chemical Distribution Careers |
hero.subtitle: Join Our Industry-Leading Team
hero.description: Launch your career in chemical distribution with ChemDist Global. Join ISO 9001 certified industry experts committed to safety, innovation, and excellence in global chemical logistics and supply chain management.

why.title: Why Choose a Career in Chemical Distribution at ChemDist Global?

industry.title: Chemical Industry Leadership
industry.description: Work with industry pioneers in chemical distribution and contribute to setting global standards in chemical safety, hazmat handling, and sustainable distribution innovation. Gain expertise in adhesives, resins, and industrial pigments.

development.title: Professional Development & Training
development.description: Access comprehensive professional development programs including OSHA certifications, hazmat training, chemical safety courses, supply chain management, and specialized logistics education to advance your chemical industry career.

network.title: Global Chemical Distribution Network
network.description: Join a worldwide chemical distribution network spanning 52 logistics hubs across four continents. Serve critical industries including packaging, food processing, paints & coatings, plastics, polymers, and industrial manufacturing.

culture.title: Chemical Distribution Company Culture & Values
culture.subtitle: We foster a workplace culture where chemical industry innovation thrives, safety is paramount, and every team member—from warehouse operations to sales—contributes to our success as a leading ISO 9001 certified chemical distributor.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Team Environment
collaboration.description: Build your chemical distribution career in a collaborative team environment. Our open-door policy and cross-functional collaboration between sales, logistics, operations, and technical teams foster innovation and problem-solving. Every voice matters—from warehouse operations to executive leadership.

innovation.title: Innovation in Chemical Logistics
innovation.description: Work with cutting-edge chemical logistics technology and supply chain software. We invest in digital transformation, automated inventory tracking systems, IoT-enabled temperature monitoring, and sustainable chemical distribution practices that position us as chemical industry leaders.

safety.title: Chemical Safety First Culture
safety.description: Zero-incident safety culture is our priority in chemical handling and distribution. Comprehensive OSHA safety training, hazmat certifications, PPE equipment, state-of-the-art chemical storage facilities, and rigorous REACH compliance protocols ensure every team member returns home safely.

growth.title: Career Growth & Advancement
growth.description: Your chemical industry career growth is our investment. Access mentorship programs, leadership development, supply chain certifications, hazmat qualifications, sales training, and clear advancement pathways from entry-level positions to management roles in our expanding global network.

positions.title: Chemical Distribution Job Openings
positions.subtitle: Explore chemical industry career opportunities across operations, sales, chemical logistics, supply chain management, warehouse operations, technical services, and customer support roles.
positions.noJobs: No Active Chemical Industry Job Openings
positions.noJobsDesc: We currently have no open chemical distribution positions. However, we're always interested in connecting with talented chemical industry professionals, logistics specialists, sales representatives, and operations managers. Please submit a general application below and we'll keep your resume on file for future career opportunities.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Team?
cta.subtitle: Don't see a position that matches your skills? Send us your resume and we'll keep you in mind for future opportunities.

hero.title: Reliability in Every Molecule
hero.subtitle: From local sourcing to global orchestration, we ensure the integrity and safety of chemical distribution through precision logistics and uncompromising compliance.

founded.label: Founded in Houston
founded.description: 1985 — Started as a local solvent distributor for the Texas oil industry.

expanded.label: Expanded to European Markets
expanded.description: 1998 — Opened the Rotterdam hub to bridge transatlantic chemical supply chains.

certified.label: ISO 9001 & 14001 Certified
certified.description: 2010 — Standardized all operations under global quality and environmental frameworks.

global.label: Global Logistics Hub Launch
global.description: 2023 — Integrated AI-driven tracking across our 52 worldwide distribution centers.

map.title: Global Distribution Network
map.subtitle: Real-time hub availability and shipping lanes.

compliance.title: Quality Assurance
compliance.subtitle: Global Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: We maintain the highest industry standards to ensure product safety, environmental protection, and operational excellence across all jurisdictions.

iso.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso.description: Quality management system certification ensuring consistent product quality and customer satisfaction through rigorous internal auditing.

environmental.title: ISO 14001:2015
environmental.description: Environmental management standards focusing on waste reduction, resource efficiency, and minimizing the environmental footprint of our logistics.

reach.title: REACH Compliance
reach.description: Registration, Evaluation, Authorisation and Restriction of Chemicals (REACH) adherence for all substances distributed within the EU.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Chemistry, Sustainable Future
sustainability.description: Our "Green Path" initiative aims to achieve net-zero carbon emissions in our logistics network by 2040. We don't just move chemicals; we move toward a cleaner planet.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: Real-time tracking available for all orders

footer.description: Supplying high-performance adhesives, saturated resins, and pigments for packaging, coatings, and manufacturing industries.
